amendment.description: An amendment numbered 68 printed in the Congressional Record to remove the word "gas" from the leasing of oil and gas production.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to remove the word "gas" from the leasing of oil and gas production.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Casten amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 237 (Roll no. 75).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Casten.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Casten amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 237 (Roll no. 75).
